byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Washington.

headline.print_headline: At Second ‘Thank You’ Rally, Trump Extols Mattis
headline.main: Rallying in North Carolina, Donald Trump Formally Introduces James Mattis

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The president-elect appeared in Fayetteville with General Mattis, his nominee for defense secretary, whom he called “one of the most effective generals” in decades....
lead_paragraph: The president-elect appeared in Fayetteville with General Mattis, his nominee for defense secretary, whom he called “one of the most effective generals” in decades.
